SELECT T1.USERID, T1.PASSWORD, T1.USERNAME, T1.USEYN, T1.USERGUBUN, T1.PHONENO, T1.MOBILENO FROM sy_usermst T1 WHERE 1=1
AND USERNAME LIKE '%$USERNAME$%'
ORDER BY T1.USERID ASC
SELECT T1.SYSID, (SELECT SYSNAME FROM sy_sysmst WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID) AS SYSNAME, T1.AUTH_YN, T1.REMARK FROM sy_usersystb T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.USERID = #USERID# ORDER BY T1.SYSID ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sy_usermst ( USERID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, USEYN, USERGUBUN, PHONENO, MOBILENO, INSERTUSER ) VALUES( #USERID#, #PASSWORD#, #USERNAME#, #USEYN#, #USERGUBUN#, #PHONENO#, #MOBILENO#, #USERIDSESSION# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sy_usermst SET PASSWORD = #PASSWORD#, USERNAME = #USERNAME#, USEYN = #USEYN#, USERGUBUN = #USERGUBUN#, PHONENO = #PHONENO#, MOBILENO = #MOBILENO#, UPDATEUSER = #USERIDSESSION#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE USERID = #USERID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sy_usersystb ( USERID, SYSID, AUTH_YN, INSERTUSER ) SELECT #USERID#, SYSID, 'N', #USERIDSESSION# FROM sy_sysmst
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sy_usersystb SET AUTH_YN = #AUTH_YN#, REMARK = #REMARK#, UPDATEUSER = #USERIDSESSION#, UPDATEDATE = NOW() WHERE USERID = #USERID# AND SYSID = #SYSID#
